reviews.review: damn good zed killin fun!!!!
The gunplay is simply astounding. A must play!

Love killing zombies?
Love the zombie addition to Call of Duty?
Love shooter games?

Then try killing floor, it has it all.
Plus you can co-op killing zombies, up to 6 people.
Level your class, top the charts and blow some zombie brains. :)

It doesn't get any better than that.

Holds a special place in my heart as being the first game I owned on steam. Easily one of my favourite games, along with it's bigger and nastier brother. Endless replayability, and thoroughly enjoyable in every aspect from UI, gameplay and mechanics. 

TRIPWIRE is easily my favourite company, they take time to craft a proper product. This is evident with KF2, which is the much more refined version of the latter. 

This game is on sale every other week. So buy it and play the sh*t out of it.

This is definitely one of my favorite games. A wide selection of guns and perks that allow you to develop differnet play styles and contribute to your team. Enemies (Zeds) are for the most part pretty standard, but also unique and challenging in their own way, especilly at the higher difficulties. While not all the maps are great, there are plenty of user generated maps online and Tripwire does an excellent job of providing new maps during their events (which are free!). 

I will say I have bought all the DLC and while the character packs are just for aesthetic appeal they're still pretty cool. The weapon packs are solid additions to the arsenal, but are in no way "pay-to-win." 

I highly recomend Killing Floor to everyone. :)

Note: One justfied complaint that I hear often is the server set-up. No, it is not great, but at this stage in the game's history, and with a confirmed sequel in the works, I really do not expect the sitution to improve.

Fun game to play with friends, gets pretty crazy on the harder difficulties. But you would probably want to train up on the normal difficulty until you have level 5 or 6 of a class before taking on things like Suisidal or Hell on Earth. Definetly a good game if you like fighting zombies type monsters or want to test your skills fighting your way through hundreds of Zeds with your friends.

Brilliant co-op shooter. Will be confusing at first, because of the perk system, but don't be afraid to ask others for help. Use your damn mic! Don't play on hard unless you're level 3+. And use your medic gun to heal others!

Gets excellent in the late game when you try Suicidal difficulty. Definitely requires perfect co-operation amongst players, but is beautiful when pulled off.

Just remember, they're all fur coats and no knickers.

わらわら湧いてくるゾンビ的実験体を協力して撃退するサバイバル・ホラーFPS。L4Dはゾンビをかき分けて目的地までたどり着くゲームだけどこっちは敵の殲滅が目的。基本的には戦いやすい場所にとどまってキャンプし、Wave終了まで耐えぬくというシンプルなルールながら、味方との連携やヘッドショットの重要性など、なかなか奥深いゲーム性。4つの難易度があり、気軽な低難易度ではゾンビをなぎ払う爽快感、経験とゲームへの理解が求められる高難易度では味方との一体感が味わえる。Wikiを一読したら即マルチへGo！だ。発売して3年近く経つのにいまだに人の絶えない不思議な魅力のゲーム。
If you love horror or suspense games, then it would be worth your time to check out Killing Floor. It is by far my favorite co-op zombie survival.

A simple fun zombie FPS. Think Counter-Strike but with zombies.
You have a bunch of waves, each wave harder zombies show up.
In between waves you purchase weapons from the trader.
There are different classes which give you different perks for different guns.
The perks can also be leveled up, but leveling is a bit of a grind.
The graphics are nice, a bit rough around the edges though, and zombies make a nice squishy sound when they die.

Yet another repetitive fps with no objective and no hope of any rea improvements
but i can see it being loads of fun ,... if your stoned enough

A Really fun Co-Op shooter. Based off the UT04 engine, face hordes of zombies with your mates and upgrade your weapons between rounds. Higher difficulties offer a great challenge and if you have a good shooter team, this is definitely one for you!
If you don't own this game you should, one of the best FPS games I have played in a long time, worth every penny. Racked up about 70 hours so far and I can see myself racking up another 70.

This game was more fun than I thought it would be. Not only does it run really well on my low spec computer, it's also a good game to play cooperatively with all your buds. It's a bit like the Call of Duty Nazi Zombies, except there's a class system, more weapons, a wider variety of enemies, and intense boss fights. I'd recommend snagging this game whenever it goes on sale.

One of the best bang-for-the-buck purchases I've ever made on Steam. Great atmosphere, style, and content. One of the few games I can come back to and play with online or with friends and always have fun. Definitely worth the purchaes if you're a survival horror afficiando or gun-nut.

One of the most addictive co-op shooters on PC. Killing Floor started out as an average game, but continuous community support and countless updates from Tripwire transformed it into a near-perfect shooter. The variety of guns, perks, maps, and crazy people online will ensure that Killing Floor never gets dull. Countless community maps & mods have kept me playing this hundreds of hours later - everything from new maps, enemies and weapons, to 40 player servers and mini-campaigns. Graphically, Killing Floor is not the nicest looking game, but that almost serves to build the atmosphere even more. I wouldn't recommend playing solo offline, but this game is a must have either way. 9.5/10

This game right here, is fucking amazing. I HIGHLY reccomend it. Sure it is the sterotypical wave survival until the boss comes, or the objective mode and what-not; but it is more than that. The.... things you have to kill are like none other I have ever seen before. And sometimes they can scare the shit out of you. And the soundtrack is also fucking badass, even tthe guitar sounds like it's screaming in horror. This game is practically metal.

Хорошая стрелялка в стиле зомби-мутантов! Много классов перков, 6 уровней прокачки, куча оружия. Радует наличие множества как официальных, так и пользовательских карт. Разработчики постоянно следят за игрой: вносят обновления, новые карты, скины, оружие. Большая разновидность противников. За эти деньги отличная игра, любителям динамичных шутеров про зомби точно понравится!
